snippet.title: Heat and Run - Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Heat and Run has an official Early Access Release Date, you will be able to take on players from around the world in 4vs4 battle starting October 13th!
➡️ Wishlist now on: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1225790/Heat_and_Run/

Follow us on:
https://twitter.com/Heat_and_Run
https://discordapp.com/invite/HjMefbK
https://www.tiktok.com/@heatandrun
https://www.instagram.com/heat_and_run
https://www.facebook.com/heatandrun.game
